titles.title: Tribal Government Tax Fairness Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat Indian tribes the same as State governments for purposes of chapter 35 of such Code.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/9/2003--Introduced. Tribal Government Tax Fairness Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code by establishing that Indian tribal governments shall be treated as States for purposes of chapter 35 (Taxes on Wagering).
